It ____ alternated ____ set ____ the ____ with ____ in ____ future ____ outer ____, ____ the ____ goals ____ teaching ____ audience ____ about ____ and ____. data.partBlankContent: The program was intended to be educational and for family viewing on the early Saturday evening schedule. It init_____ alternated sto____ set i_ the pa__ with th___ in t__ future o_ outer sp___, wi__ the respe_____ goals o_ teaching you____ audience mem____ about his____ and sci____. This was also reflected in the Doctor's original companions, one of whom was a science teacher and another a history teacher.
data.answer: 这个节目原本是为了教育和家庭观看，在周六晚上早些时候的时间表。它最初交替讲述过去和未来或外太空的故事，各自的目标是向年轻观众传授历史和科学知识。这一点也体现在博士最初的同伴中，其中一个是科学老师，另一个是历史老师。
